alert.note: Alert for Harney County; Malheur County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 3:55AM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...In Idaho, Southern Twin Falls County zone. In Oregon, Harney County and Malheur County zones. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility with near whiteout conditions late tonight into Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect heavy snow showers today before briefly decreasing this evening. Snow will increase once again late tonight into Wednesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
